data.name: Street Fighter V - Season 3 Character Pass
data.detailed_description:
Contains 6 additional characters who join the fight throughout the year: Sakura, Blanka, Falke, Cody, G, and Sagat. Each Season 3 character comes with a Premium Battle costume with colors 3-10 unlocked.

Additionally, Season 3 Character Pass holders will receive default costume colors 3-10 for all Season 3 Character Pass characters!
data.about_the_game:
Contains 6 additional characters who join the fight throughout the year: Sakura, Blanka, Falke, Cody, G, and Sagat. Each Season 3 character comes with a Premium Battle costume with colors 3-10 unlocked.

Additionally, Season 3 Character Pass holders will receive default costume colors 3-10 for all Season 3 Character Pass characters!

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese*, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
